channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Social Icons Widget & Block by WPZOOM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Social Icons Widget & Block by WPZOOM

item.title: CVE-2024-2189|2024-05-21T06:00:01.749Z -- Unknown -- Social Icons Widget & Block by WPZOOM
item.description: The Social Icons Widget & Block by WPZOOM WordPress plugin before 4.2.18 does not sanitise and escape some of its Widget settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
